title: X-WAR
description: Team-based shooter with a unique token betting mechanic. Gather your squad, place your bets, and fight for the enemy‚Äôs pot. Winners take all ‚Äî losers walk away with nothing.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# üèÜ WIN TO EARN ‚Äî high-stakes gameplay
<!--text-->
One of the core features is the WIN TO EARN mode. Before the match, both teams place a bet using $XWAR tokens, creating a shared prize pool. The winning team takes it all ‚Äî the losers walk away with nothing. Maximum tension, no compromises.

<!--image-->
![X-WAR-1qj1e](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c3a52482fdbb4d739f6eeda307b1b334/xwar-1qj1e.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# üë• CLANS, COMPETITIONS, GLOBAL TOURNAMENTS
<!--text-->
Team up with other players, form alliances, and dominate in clan wars. Tournaments with big rewards, leaderboards, and anti-cheat systems ensure fair and intense battles.

<!--image-->
![X-WAR-x31q5](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c3a52482fdbb4d739f6eeda307b1b334/xwar-x31q5.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# üî• WEAPON & CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
<!--text-->
Unlock over 25 weapon types and upgrade them with 200+ mods‚Äîscopes, attachments, and other enhancements. Customize your fighter‚Äôs appearance: gear and accessories will help you stand out on the battlefield.

<!--image-->
![X-WAR-xplpw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c3a52482fdbb4d739f6eeda307b1b334/xwar-xplpw.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# üí∞ ECONOMY & PROGRESSION
<!--text-->
Earn $XWAR tokens by completing daily missions. Invest in top-tier gear, join clans, and compete in tournaments with massive prize pools.

<!--image-->
![X-WAR-8hyv7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c3a52482fdbb4d739f6eeda307b1b334/xwar-8hyv7.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# üåÉ REFERRAL SYSTEM
<!--text-->
Invite friends using your personal promo code and earn rewards like boosts, tokens, and gear. The more people you invite, the bigger the prizes!

<!--image-->
![X-WAR-akm2q](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c3a52482fdbb4d739f6eeda307b1b334/xwar-akm2q.png)
